speaker: Alex
line: Yo, Maya! Did you just hear that weird hum from the lab?

speaker: Maya
line: Ugh, Alex, I was just calibrating the quantum coffee maker. *sips* It’s already better than your mixtape.

speaker: Zed
line: Hold up—what’s that glow? My antenna’s picking up interdimensional traffic!

speaker: Luna
line: Guys, guys, if we don’t stop arguing, the portal’s gonna swallow the whole studio.

speaker: Alex
line: Whoa—did the coffee maker just levitate?!

speaker: Maya
line: That’s not levitating, that’s *my* espresso doing a backflip. *laughs*

speaker: Zed
line: Okay, okay, listen up! If we sync the synth with the portal frequency, we can broadcast the ultimate jam across dimensions.

speaker: Luna
line: And I’ll drop the beat that makes the multiverse groove. Ready?

speaker: All
line: *Cue epic synth drop, lights flash, a swirling vortex appears behind them*

speaker: Alex
line: Whoa—did you see that? The whole room just turned into a rave on Mars!

speaker: Maya
line: That’s the ‘wow’ moment, folks. Interdimensional radio? Nailed it.

speaker: Zed
line: If you want the full experience, hit the link in the bio!
